name: IT201_Sprint04_Jessica_Odoom
description: I am not a  gamer.  I believe gaming is extremely time-consuming. Therefore, when I created this game I wanted to incorporate two things that I am passionate about: healthcare and technology. This game serves as a relaxation tool. As a healthcare worker in the field of psych everyone is always looking for a way to cool down and relax. This is the final version of my game. For this final version, I  have cleaned up all code and added clear documentation. Features that did not work previously in other versions of this game now do. I hope you enjoy the final product as much as I enjoyed creating it.
